com.google.code.gtkjfilechooser

Class NavigationKeyBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.code.gtkjfilechooser.BasicActionDispatcher
      • com.google.code.gtkjfilechooser.NavigationKeyBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionDispatcher

    public class NavigationKeyBinding
extends BasicActionDispatcher
    Bind key action to a JComponent. The Key actions dispatch the following signals:
    Signal name Default key combinations
    location-popup Control+L (empty path); / (path of "/") ~; (path of "~")
    up-folder Alt+Up; Backspace
    down-folder Alt+Down
    home-folder Alt+Home
    desktop-folder Alt+D
    quick-bookmark Alt+1 through Alt+0
    Author:
    c.cerbo
